mapper.insert: INSERT INTO `t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission` ( permission_name, method,menu_id, permission_type, is_disable) VALUES (#{buttonName}, #{method}, #{menuId}, #{buttonType}, #{isDisable})
mapper.select: SELECT permission_id AS permissionId, permission_name AS permissionName, method , permission_type AS permissionType, menu_id AS menuId, is_disable AS isDisable FROM `t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission` WHERE permission_id=#{permissionId}

SELECT b.permission_name as permissionName, b.permission_id as permissionId, b.method as method, b.permission_type as permissionType, ( CASE b.is_disable WHEN '0' THEN '启用' WHEN '1' THEN '禁用' end ) as state FROM t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission b WHERE b.permission_id IN
#{item}

SELECT permission_id AS permissionId, CONCAT(namespace, ':', method) AS roleCode FROM t_ucenter_ms_menu menu, t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission button
, `t_admin_app_menu_item` app, `t_admin_app_group_rela` rela, t_admin_group grou
WHERE menu.menu_id = button.menu_id AND menu.menu_type like '%${menuType}%'
AND grou.group_code = #{groupCode} AND grou.`group_id` = rela.`group_id` AND app.model_type = 0 AND rela.app_id = app.app_id AND app.model_key = menu.menu_id

SELECT permission_id AS permissionId, CONCAT(namespace, ':', method) AS roleCode FROM t_ucenter_ms_menu menu INNER JOIN `t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission` button ON button.menu_id = menu.menu_id INNER JOIN t_app_apply apply ON apply.apply_state = 3 AND manager_code = CONCAT(#{groupCode},':',#{managerId}) INNER JOIN t_admin_app_menu_item app ON apply.`app_id` = app.`app_id` AND app.model_type = 0 AND app.model_key = menu.menu_id WHERE menu.menu_type LIKE '%${menuType}%'
SELECT permission_id AS permissionId, url AS url FROM t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission_url_rela WHERE permission_id = #{permissionId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO t_ucenter_ms_menu_permission_url_rela ( permission_id, url) VALUES (#{permissionId}, #{url})
